abstract: Two independent surveys find improvements to China's manufacturing sector in June 2015, suggesting that factory activity may be regaining momentum after downturn.
lead_paragraph: Two nongovernment surveys suggested the economy might be regaining some momentum.

headline.main: China Factory Activity Appears to Stabilize
headline.print_headline: China Factory Activity Appears to Stabilize

snippet: Two nongovernment surveys suggested the economy might be regaining some momentum.
